name: elearning-core
description: eLearning platform language-agnostic core, used in client projects as a submodule
author: The Language Conservancy

scripts.install-dependencies: npm install && cd ./frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && composer install
scripts.prepare-platform:demo: npm run copy-assets:demo && npm run generate-config-based-files:demo
scripts.prepare-platform:local: npm run copy-assets:local && npm run generate-config-based-files:local
scripts.prepare-platform:staging: npm run copy-assets:staging && npm run generate-config-based-files:staging
scripts.prepare-platform:production: npm run copy-assets:production && npm run generate-config-based-files:production
scripts.build:staging: npm run prepare-platform:staging && node scripts/build-with-type.js -s && npm run cap:sync
scripts.build:production: npm run prepare-platform:production && node scripts/build-with-type.js -p && npm run cap:sync
scripts.serve:demo: npm run copy-assets:demo && npm run generate-config-based-files:demo && cd frontend && npm run serve
scripts.serve:local: npm run copy-assets:local && npm run generate-config-based-files:local && cd frontend && npm run serve
